title: Country Happiness EDA
description: Exploring the correlation between country happiness and urban population percentage. Performing OLS regression to examine other confounding factors such as GDP, life expectancy, and social support.

title: Identifying Sleep Deserts
description: Performing analysis on the possibility of sleep deserts. Looking for correlations between overall sleep quality and factors such as air polltion, GDP and socioeconomic score.

title: High Protein Recipes EDA
description: Perfoming analysis on high protein recipes and looking at their feasibility to cook. Also exploring correlations between rating and time to cook to further healthy eating.

title: Climate Change Impact on Cities
description: Analyzing climate change data to assess the vulnerability of major cities to rising temperatures and extreme weather events.

title: Electric Vehicle Adoption Trends
description: Examining the growth of electric vehicle adoption worldwide, focusing on policies, incentives, and regional differences.

title: Remote Work Productivity Study
description: Analyzing survey data to understand how remote work affects employee productivity, collaboration, and job satisfaction.

title: Renewable Energy Investment Analysis
description: Exploring investment patterns in solar, wind, and other renewable energy projects to evaluate ROI and growth potential.

title: Urban Green Spaces Study
description: Investigating the relationship between urban green spaces and public health outcomes in densely populated cities.

title: AI in Healthcare Applications
description: Assessing the implementation of AI tools in medical diagnosis, treatment planning, and patient monitoring.

title: Food Waste Reduction Strategies
description: Analyzing approaches to reduce food waste at the consumer and industrial levels, and evaluating their effectiveness.

title: Sustainable Fashion Trends
description: Studying sustainable practices in the fashion industry, including material sourcing, recycling, and consumer behavior.

title: Digital Literacy in Education
description: Exploring how digital literacy programs impact student learning outcomes and technology adoption in classrooms.
